I had the misfortune of buying Volumes 1 and 9 of this 30-volume series, and found that the manufacturer had superimposed its "Platinum Disc Corporation" logo in the bottom right corner of the screen throughout each movie. I don't know that the other 28 discs in the series have been treated the same, but I wouldn't take the risk of buying any more of them. Most if not all of the movies on these discs are available from other manufacturers who are more respectful of the films.
